channel.title: Skiller-Pkz 718 - || Unique Home! || Come Join Us! || 24/7 || Stable || Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[b][size=40pt]Welcome[/size][/b]
[size=25pt][b]To[/b][/size]
[img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/cool.png[/img]
[url=http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/forum] [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/home.png[/img] [/url] [url=http://skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Skiller-Pkz718.jar] [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/playnow.png[/img] [/url]
[size=24pt][i][b]Why should I play Skiller-Pkz?[/b][/i][/size]
Skiller-Pkz is a 718 loading 742 Economy & Player Killing Server, that has friendly and nice Player/Staff to talk to and train skills with. Skiller-Pkz´s development team is always open to any suggestions, and we have many features in all sorts of types of accounts can raise money, even if you've decided to be a 'skiller' so it does not mean that you can not earn as much money as a fighter does, that's reversed, you make more money when you are a skiller, as you have much to do so as; Making some armours and sell them to the General Store, and you can therefore also sell items to the players and they are sold frequently and the thing is so like; Bars, logs, ores, potions and much more, so at Skiller-Pkz it does not matter, even if you choose to be something other than fighting or pure, it does not mean that you can't raise money at Skiller-Pkz!
[b][size=18pt]Server Information[/size][/b]
Vote4Cash System!
Donation System!
WE GOT VPS! Stable and No lag
UNIQUE HOME!
Friendly Staffs <(*-*)>
- All skills working 100% - Custom Dungeoneering - Spirit Three with Teleports! - All special attacks. - Obtainable Capes. - AutoCasting - Lost of Donator Benefits. - Custom Yell Tags. - Minigames - Recipe for Disaster. - All Spellbooks. - Regular updates! - Multi Barrages - Working Summoning - Flawless Pking & Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Ancients. - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects). - Staff of light Special - Yell with custom tags!
Glacors. Jadinko Lair. Ganodermic. Strykewyrms. Dagonnoth's. Armoured Zombies (Training Area).
We have many bosses that works, such as; Queen Black Dragon, Kalphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corp Beast, Bork, Tormented Demons and many more!
We have almost all slayer dungeons, and we also have dungeons such as; Godwars, Daggannoth Dungeon, Polypore Dungeon, Glacors Dungeon, Grotworms, Revenants, Jadinko and many more!.
RuneSpan works very well, it has some different options.
& Much More
[spoiler=Pictures] Home [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/Home.png[/img] All Skills Working! [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/Skills.png[/img] Teleports! [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/Teleports.png[/img] Soc! [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/Soc.png[/img] [/spoiler]
What are you waiting for? [url=http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/forum] [img]http://www.skiller-pkz718.cu.cc/Pics/joinnow.jpg[/img] [/url]
[/CENTER]

@matteskill wrote:

[CENTER]

[size=40pt]Welcome[/size]

[size=25pt]To[/size]


[size=24pt]Why should I play Skiller-Pkz?[/size]

Skiller-Pkz is a 718 loading 742 Economy & Player Killing Server, that has friendly and nice Player/Staff to talk to and train skills with.
Skiller-Pkz´s development team is always open to any suggestions,
and we have many features in all sorts of types of accounts can raise money,
even if you’ve decided to be a ‘skiller’ so it does not mean that you can not earn as much money as a fighter does,
that’s reversed, you make more money when you are a skiller,
as you have much to do so as; Making some armours and sell them to the General Store,
and you can therefore also sell items to the players and they are sold
frequently and the thing is so like; Bars, logs, ores, potions and much more, so at Skiller-Pkz it does not matter,
even if you choose to be something other than fighting or pure,
it does not mean that you can’t raise money at Skiller-Pkz!
